column4: Hi, I can't connect to my wireless network on Ubuntu ( or any other networks that use WPA/WPA2 encryption ) -- WEP works fine. I'm using an Atheros chipset.
wait -- I'll get you the exact command that might not be 100% correct...
I had to use wicd instead of network-manager for a friends setup in karmic.. worth a try if you dont find any other answer.
